targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  label_join(adnl_peer, "socket_addr", ":", "ip", "port") * on(socket_addr) group_left validator_ip,
  "latitude", "$1", "adjusted_latitude", "(.+)"),
  "longitude", "$1", "adjusted_longitude", "(.+)")

label_replace(
label_replace(
  label_join(adnl_peer, "socket_addr", ":", "ip", "port") unless label_join(adnl_peer, "socket_addr", ":", "ip", "port") * on(socket_addr) group_left validator_ip,
  "latitude", "$1", "adjusted_latitude", "(.+)"),
  "longitude", "$1", "adjusted_longitude", "(.+)")

options.content:
## Everscale monitoring

Exporter can be self-hosted by anyone: [GitHub repo](https://github.com/broxus/everscale-monitoring). 

If you have any suggestions or noticed some errors - please fill an issue on github. 

Alerts channel in Telegram: [@everscale_monitoring](https://t.me/everscale_monitoring)

panels.description: Speed of applying of blocks over last 5 minutes
panels.title: Blocks rate 5m

panels.description: Speed of applying of messages over last 5 minutes
panels.title: Messages rate 5m

panels.description: Speed of applying of transactions over last 5 minutes
panels.title: Transactions rate 5m

panels.description: Number of shards (threads) in the network compared to configured in the network configuration
panels.title: Number of shards

panels.description: State timeline of shards block speed over the last 5 minutes
panels.title: Shard rates

panels.description: Amount of time shardchains are behind masterchain
panels.title: Shard lag

panels.description: Time difference between now and when monitoring service collected information from the blockchain
panels.title: Information collected

panels.description:
MC: Masterchain, SC: Shardchain (average),

mSC: Shardchain (maximum)
panels.title: Last block delta

panels.description: Status and participant amount of the elections
panels.title: State of elections

targets.expr:
((
    validator / 1000000000
) + on(pubkey) group_left(socket_addr) (0 * validator_ip))
or on(pubkey) (validator / 1000000000)
((validator * 0) + on(pubkey) (count by(pubkey) ((overlay_entry * on(overlay_id) group_left overlay{workchain="-1"}) and on(pubkey) (overlay_entry * 0)))) or on(pubkey) (validator * 0)

(validator + on(pubkey) group_left(shard_full) overlay_entry * on(overlay_id) group_left(shard_full) label_replace(overlay{workchain="0"}, "shard_full", "0:$1...", "shard", "(.*)")) or on(pubkey) validator
